title: Bug 135497Data Type is not correct when "Generate All" for Data item
description: Bug 135497Data Type is not correct when "Generate All" for Data item
OB: Insert a data into layout, bind with the dataset.Click "Generate All" to get the Data Binding columns, but the displayed data type is not consistent with the actual one.
SR: Description:Create a sample datasource and dataset. Insert a data into layout, bind with the dataset.Click "Generate All" to get the Data Binding columns, but the displayed data type is not consistent with the actual one.
